#include<stdio.h>
int main() {
	long long t,a,b,c,d,p,x,y;
//	freopen("inm.txt","r",stdin);
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--) {
		long long int row,col,row1,col1,row2,col2,i,sum;
		scanf("%lld",&p);
		scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld\n",&a,&b,&c,&d);
		scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y);
		if(x==1 && y==1)
		{
			printf("1\n");
			continue;
		}
		if(x==1 && y==2)
		{
			printf("3\n");
			continue;
		}
		if(x==2 && y==1)
		{
			printf("4\n");
			continue;
		}
		if(x==2 && y==2)
		{
			printf("5\n");
			continue;
		}
		row=1;
		col=1;
		while(row<x || col <y) {
			row=row*2;
			col=col*2;
		}
	//	printf("row=%lld col=%lld\n",row,col);
		row1=1;
		col1=1;
		sum=1;
		while(1) {
			row2=(row+row1)/2;
			col2=(col+col1)/2;
	//		printf("row=%lld col=%lld row1=%lld col1=%lld rol2=%lld col2=%lld x=%lld y=%lld\n",row,col,row1,col1,row2,col2,x,y);
			if((row2==row || row2==row1) && (col2==col || col2==col1))
			break;
			if(x>=row1 && y >=col1 && x<=row2 && y<=col2) {
				sum=sum*a;
				row=row2;
				col=col2;
	//			printf("1.%lld\n",sum);
			}
			else if(x>=row1 && x<=row2 && y>=col1 && y>=col2) {
				sum=sum*b;
				row=row2;
				col1=col2;
	//			printf("2.%lld\n",sum);
			}
			else if(x>=row1 && x>=row2 && y>=col1 && y<=col2) {
				sum=sum*c;
				row1=row2;
				col=col2;
	//			printf("3.%lld\n",sum);
			}
			else if(x>=row1 && x>=row2 && y>=col1 && y>=col2) {
				sum=sum*d;
				row1=row2;
				col1=col2;
	//			printf("4.%lld\n",sum);
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
